name: DBClusterParameterGroup
shortDesc: The AWS::RDS::DBClusterParameterGroup resource creates a new Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) database (DB) cluster parameter group. For more information about DB cluster parameter groups, see Appendix: DB Cluster and DB Instance Parameters in the Amazon Relational Database Service User Guide.

properties.name: Description
properties.desc: A friendly description for this DB cluster parameter group.

properties.name: Family
properties.desc: The database family of this DB cluster parameter group, such as aurora5.6.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.desc: The parameters to set for this DB cluster parameter group. For a list of parameter keys, see Appendix: DB Cluster and DB Instance Parameters in the Amazon Relational Database Service User Guide.
properties.type: A JSON object consisting of string key-value pairs, as shown in the following example:
properties.update: No interruption or some interruptions, depending on the parameters that you update.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: The tags that you want to attach to this parameter group.
